title: Riding the Red Bull Wave: Breaking Down How Bora-Hansgrohe’s New Owners Will, and Won’t, Alter the Team’s Trajectory
content:
Taking careful stock of Red Bull's blockbuster acquisition of Bora-Hansgrohe and its implications on cycling in the near future.

Read the full article at Riding the Red Bull Wave: Breaking Down How Bora-Hansgrohe’s New Owners Will, and Won’t, Alter the Team’s Trajectory on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
